com.armandorv.cnpd.web.shared.remote
Interface ResourcesService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ResourcesServiceImpl
public interface ResourcesService

Resources remote service for client side resources presenter.

Author:
armandorv

Method Detail

getResources

java.util.List<ResourceInfo> getResources(long projectId,
                                          boolean draft)
Retrieve all resources of a given project.

Parameters:
idProject - identifier of project.
Returns:
all top level resources of project.

createResource

ResourceInfo createResource(long projectId,
                            long parentId,
                            ResourceInfo resource,
                            boolean draft)
Create a new resource on business model and on files server.

Parameters:
id - id of project owner.
resource - info to create new resource.
free - if true resource is added to free resources list.
Returns:

deleteResource

boolean deleteResource(long projectId,
                       long resourceId,
                       boolean draft)
Delete a resource for a concrete project.

Parameters:
idProject - identifier of owner project.
idResource - identifier of resource to remove.
free - true if resource is true.
Returns:
true if all OK.

renameResource

boolean renameResource(long projectId,
                       long resourceId,
                       java.lang.String name)
Rename a resource of a project.

Parameters:
idProject - indicate project where is resource to rename.
idResource - indicate resource to rename.
name - new name.
free - true if resource is a free resource.
Returns:
true if all OK.

java.lang.String getFileContent(long projectId,

Get the content of a file.

Parameters:
projectId - identifier of the project.
resource - resource to get their content.
Returns:
a String with the file content.

saveFileContent

boolean saveFileContent(java.lang.String url,
                        java.lang.String parentUrl,
                        java.lang.String content)
Save the content of a file.

Parameters:
url - URL of resource in subversion.
parentUrl - URL of resource parent in subversion.
content - new content of the file.
Returns:
true if all ok.

                     long resourceId,
                     long parentId)
Move a resource to another resource.

Parameters:

parentId - identifier of the resource parent.
Returns:
true if all OK.

                           long resourceId,
                           boolean toDrafts)
Move a resource to the project root.

Parameters:

resourceId - identifier of the resource.
toDrafts - if the resources are drafts.
Returns:
true if all OK.
